00043 #ifndef _orxPROFILER_H_
00044 #define _orxPROFILER_H_
00045 
00046 #include "orxInclude.h"
00047 
00048 
00051 #define orxPROFILER_PUSH_MARKER(NAME)         \
00052 do                                            \
00053 {                                             \
00054   static orxS32 s32ProfilerID = -1;           \
00055                                               \
00056   if(s32ProfilerID < 0)                       \
00057   {                                           \
00058     s32ProfilerID = orxProfiler_GetID(NAME);  \
00059   }                                           \
00060                                               \
00061   orxProfiler_PushMarker(s32ProfilerID);      \
00062 } while(orxFALSE)
00063 
00064 #define orxPROFILER_POP_MARKER()                  orxProfiler_PopMarker();
00065 
00066 
00069 #define orxPROFILER_KU32_MAX_MARKER_NUMBER        128
00070 #define orxPROFILER_KS32_MARKER_ID_NONE           -1
00071 
00072 
00074 extern orxDLLAPI void orxFASTCALL                 orxProfiler_Setup();
00075 
00079 extern orxDLLAPI orxSTATUS orxFASTCALL            orxProfiler_Init();
00080 
00082 extern orxDLLAPI void orxFASTCALL                 orxProfiler_Exit();
00083 
00088 extern orxDLLAPI orxS32 orxFASTCALL               orxProfiler_GetID(const orxSTRING _zName);
00089 
00093 extern orxDLLAPI void orxFASTCALL                 orxProfiler_PushMarker(orxS32 _s32MarkerID);
00094 
00097 extern orxDLLAPI void orxFASTCALL                 orxProfiler_PopMarker();
00098 
00099 
00100 #endif /* _orxPROFILER_H_ */
